update.releaseNotes:
v4.3.4 - Changelog
New --- - Add a tooltip next to the Home page button to indicate that a scenario needs to be selected first before starting. Only appears if no scenario is currently selected. - App will now require disabling Android's battery optimization.
Adjustments --- - Update game data up to Oguri Cap (Christmas) 2026-01-04. - Bump Automation Library to 2.3.5. - Adjust guidance regions to not cover the top right corner or the center middle bottom of the screen. - Move skill hint detection to be in a Thread during parallel processing. - Updated the drawer to allow Back navigation via gesture and/or hardware button. - Clamp the input for daysToRunExtraRaces to be 1 at a minimum to avoid possible division by zero. - Persist the message log font size into SQLite. - Apply manual corrections to main stat gains that go over +100.
Fixed --- - Fix bug where importing settings via the JSON file failed to show any available changes.
